body: I believe this is also specifically tested for in [this test](https://github.com/golang/go/blob/5c5e8d41054940ccf9e1c025bf21c86e85f33bde/src/net/http/httputil/reverseproxy_test.go#L32). Note [the checking](https://github.com/golang/go/blob/5c5e8d41054940ccf9e1c025bf21c86e85f33bde/src/net/http/httputil/reverseproxy_test.go#L51) of `req.Host` in the backend server to verify it stays the same as what was in [the original request](https://github.com/golang/go/blob/5c5e8d41054940ccf9e1c025bf21c86e85f33bde/src/net/http/httputil/reverseproxy_test.go#L76) sent to the proxy.
